name: Ali Arman Jayed
title: Senior Software Engineer
bio:
I'm a passionate Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications and distributed systems. I specialize in React, Node.js, TypeScript, and cloud-native technologies. Currently focused on building products that solve real-world problems and create meaningful impact.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me contributing to open-source projects, writing technical articles, or exploring the latest in AI and machine learning. I believe in continuous learning and love tackling complex challenges.
shortBio: Senior Software Engineer passionate about building scalable applications and exceptional user experiences. 5+ years of experience with modern web technologies.
